title: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf | Academy of Achievement

organizations.name: University of Wisconsin
quotes: He was an agriculturalist. As a matter of fact, he had come back from the University of Wisconsin, where he’d done work in agriculture, and that’s how we got married.
That’s when I went back to college, and he went back to do graduate work, again at the University of Wisconsin.

roles.title: housewife
quotes: And with four children born successively almost every year, I became a housewife very fast.

roles.title: agriculturalist
quotes: He was an agriculturalist. As a matter of fact, he had come back from the University of Wisconsin, where he’d done work in agriculture, and that’s how we got married.
Fortunately we have, in Africa, the extended family system.
No, no, no. Fortunately we have, in Africa, the extended family system. There’s no way we both could have gone to school in the U.S. with four young children.
